Variable: Initial Per Capita Annual Domestic Wastwater Generated
Information: Represents the estimated quantity, in kg/year, that each person produces in domestic wastewater. This value is modified by the log elasticity of production to gdp/capita. Increasing GDP/Capita is associated with increasing per capita liquid waste generation; see `Jones, Vliet, Qadir, and Bierkens (2021) <https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-13-237-2021>`_.

Variable: Fraction of Protein in Diet With Red Meat
Notes: Used to estimate protein content in domestic wastewater. Protein (see IPCC GHG Guidance) . See Table 1 in `Papier et al. (2019) <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6521004/#app1-nutrients-11-00824>`_ for the source of these numbers.

Variable: Fraction of Protein in Diet Without Red Meat
Log Elasticity DWW Production to GDP Per Capita
Information: Log elasticity :math:`\varepsilon` of domestic wastewater production per capita to GDP/capita. For a year over year growth in GDP/capita :math:`\Delta g`, the change in domestic wastewater production per capita is estimated as :math:`\Delta W_{d} = (1 + \Delta g)^{\varepsilon} - 1`.
Notes: Derived from `Jones, Vliet, Qadir, and Bierkens <https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-13-237-2021>`_ : Country-level and gridded estimates of wastewater production, collection, treatment and reuse, Earth Syst. Sci. Data, 13, 237–254, https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-13-237-2021, 2021. See table 3.1 for the regression coefficient associated with the log production of wastewater, found as 0.31.

Information: Annual biochemical oxygen demand (BOD) per person. Table 6.4 in IPCC Guidelines for NGHG Inventories shows regional factors.
Average annual chemical oxygen demand (COD) in industrial water per GDP at time :math:`t = 0`. Mean and range derived from Volume 5, Table 6.9 in IPCC Guidelines for NGHG Inventories.
